full_text: rate: a 2020/KER/427 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT HRNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON TUESDAY, THE 07TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 17TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.5799 OF 2019(D) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN SC 716/2011 OF ADDITIONAL DISTRICT COURT & SESSIONS COURT -IV, THRISSUR CRIME NO.31/2011 OF Chavakkad Police Station, Thrissur PETITIONERS /ACCUSED: 1 HANEEFA, AGED 66 YEARS, S/O. KUNHAMU, CHALIYATH HOUSE, KADARIYA MOSQUE, AKALAD DESOM, PUNNAYOOR VILLAGE. 2 SHARAFUDHEEN, S/O. ABDU, VYPPINKATTIL HOUSE, ALA DESOM, S.N PURAM VILLAGE, KODUNGALLUR. BY ADV. SRI.M.SHAJU PURUSHOTHAMAN RESPONDENTS /DEFACTO COMPLAINANT: 1 STATE OF KERALA REP. BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, REPRESENTING THE C.I OF POLICE , CHAVAKKAD-680 512. 2 BASHEER, AGED 80 YEARS, S/O. ABDULLA, POKKAKKILLATH HOUSE, PALAYOOR DESOM, GURUVAYOOR VILLAGE, CHAVAKKAD TALUK-680 512. R1 BY SRI. C.S.HRITHWIK, SR.PP R2 BY ADV. M.SUKUMARAN OTHER PRESENT: THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 07.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Crl1.M.C.No.5799 of 2019 > 2020/KER/427 ORDER Dated this the 7th day of January 2020 The petitioners are accused in $.C.No.716/2011 on the file of the Additional Sessions Court-IV, Thrissur, for having allegedly committed the offences punishable under Sections 452, 324, 326, 307 read with Section 34 of I.P.C. The defacto complainant- injured is the 2" respondent herein, who has appeared through a Counsel and has filed an affidavit stating that the matter has been amicably settled and he has no existing grievance against the petitioners. A report has been filed by the investigating officer through the Senior Public Prosecutor to that effect. The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents and no public interest is involved. The injury sustained by the defacto complainant is not life- threatening. In the result, the Crl.M.C. is allowed and the entire proceedings in S.C.No.716/2011 on the file of rate: a Crl1.M.C.No.5799 of 2019 2020/KER/427 3 the Additional Sessions Court-IV, Thrissur, stands quashed under Section 482 of Cr.P.C. and the petitioners are discharged. Sd/- dkr ASHOK MENON JUDGE ae ree 7) ers a Cr1.M.C.No.5799 of 2019 2020/KER/427 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A COPY OF THE RELEVANT EXTRACT OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 31/2011 REGISTERED BY THE CHAVAKKAD POLICE DT 11-02-2011 ANNEXURE B AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE DE-FACTO COMPLAINANT/2ND RESPONDENT DT. 8-8-2019 ANNEXURE C THE CERTIFIED OF THE DEPOSITION OF THE 2ND RESPONDENT/DE-FACT COMPLAINANT AS PW 1 IN S.C 716/2011 DT. 1-2-2017
